CustomField.description: For each user, check the Org to see what Sector they belong too. If they belong to "Central Government Dept" then upgrade them to the Customer Portal Plug liscence. Else give them the Customer Portal Logib liscence.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For each user, check the Org to see what Sector they belong too. If they belong to "Central Government Dept" then upgrade them to the Customer Portal Plug liscence. Else give them the Customer Portal Logib liscence.
CustomField.label: CheckUserOrgSector
